title: Introducing: Cosmo Sheldrake
body:
You will definitely know when you bump into [Cosmo Sheldrake](http://www.

cosmosheldrake.com/) because he’ll be waving his mic under your shoe, near the creaking doors and in close proximity to your mouth whilst you’re eating crisps. He doesn’t have an odd addiction, Cosmo travels around the world collecting interesting sounds to add to a massive databank for looping into his latest tracks. His sound is so tight, polished and clean and combine perfectly with his vocals- occasionally difficult to imagine that many of his sounds were picked up whilst travelling on a truck in Bulgaria. In addition to collecting random sounds, Cosmo can competently play around 30 instruments, beat box and is known to indulge in Mongolian throat singing and Tibetan chanting. Extremely excited for what is to come…
